body: @lampuiho THANKS FOR TELLING ME IT'S LOLI, I'M GOING TO CHECK IT NOW BECAUSE I LOVE LOLIS
BE WARNED! DO NOT check out "GEIGER COUNTER" suggested by "indifferently", IT'S DISGUSTING LOLI, NOT women who look like fashion models.
@marcusg14: it had something to do with acupuncture in the title i think.

So since no one will actually comment on this, I need help fining an older manga. Female gets recommended massage parlor by coworker. Creepy looking guy gives her massage ending in sexual acts, post scene she recommends it to another coworker. Generic stuff but I can't seem to find it even with overly specific tag searching. Can someone else help?
